about_the_game:
FIGHT, LEAD, AND CONQUER

Unleash a powerful arsenal and unique abilities to defend your territory and break through enemy lines in Rocketman’s intense real-time combat. Lead a squad of troops, guiding them forward only once an area is secured. Your strategic decisions and special abilities shape the battlefield, demanding quick reflexes and careful planning. Adapt to the shifting tides of battle, using your skills to control the flow of enemies and push your squad through each wave of relentless foes, overcoming every challenge that stands in your way.

MULTI-MODE MISSIONS

Explore two gameplay modes: Story Mode, where every decision you make as Ranger Ross shapes an evolving narrative, and Free Mode, where you can take control of different characters, each with their own unique combat style, to experience Krit’s battles from multiple perspectives.

DYNAMIC BATTLEFIELDS

Enter dynamic battlefields where Three unique arenas offer fresh tactical opportunities and challenges. Defend your bases with strategic squad placements and unleash different troop abilities in every round. With each match, a new deck of powerful abilities adds layers of strategy, ensuring that no two battles play the same as you adapt to an ever-changing tactical landscape.

A NARRATIVE OF LOYALTY AND SACRIFICE

Embark on an intense journey across the embattled planet of Krit as Ranger Ross, a legendary fighter confronting relentless enemies and fragile alliances. Facing a monstrous infestation and torn factions, Ross navigates a web of political intrigue, personal vendettas, and buried secrets. With fierce combat, ambiguous loyalties, and a world teetering on chaos, Rocketman offers a gripping story of survival and redemption as Ross fights to uncover the truth. Cutscenes presented as a digital comic book bring the story to life, delivering key moments with striking visuals and dramatic flair.

KEY FEATURES

  • Handcrafted, Dynamic Arenas: Experience meticulously crafted battlegrounds with unique challenges and tactical opportunities.

  • Tactical Real-Time Combat: Engage in a fluid combat system that combines shooting mechanics, and on-the-fly adjustments that makes every battle different.

  • Story-Driven Campaigns: Venture through missions where combat blends with a narrative filled with political drama and personal stakes.

  • Dual Game Modes: Switch between the immersive Story Mode or the exploratory Free Mode for a broader experience.

  • Customize Your Playstyle: Experiment with weapons, abilities, and tactics to create a personalized combat strategy.

short_description: Rocketman is a high-intensity, top-down ARPG that brings you to the chaos of Planet Krit. Blend fast-paced combat with strategic tower defense as you battle relentless foes, upgrade your arsenal, and adapt to an ever-changing battlefield. Become the hero in this explosive fight for survival!
